title: The Making of 'Anna'
creator_credit: Robert Francis, Victoria. Audio-Visual Education Centre and Victorian Film Corporation
brief_description: Follows Australian director Esben Storm, the cast and crew of “In Search of Anna” as the production is filmed. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
